    Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics  

    • Uses of Effect in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics

      Subclasses of Effect in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DualTextureEffect
      Contains a configurable effect that supports two-layer multitexturing.
      class  EffectMaterial
      Contains an effect subclass which is used to load data for an EffectMaterialContent type.

      Begins a sprite batch operation using the specified sort, blend, sampler, depth stencil, rasterizer state objects, plus a custom effect and a 2D transformation matrix.
